biotools.summary: FalseColor-Python is a rapid intensity-leveling and digital-staining package for fluorescence-based slide-free digital pathology. It can be used for translating two-channel fluorescence images (i.e. a nuclear and cytoplasmic stain) to the traditional H&E histopathology color space.

bioschemas.name: FalseColor-Python
